title: Basic Fitness Concepts
description: Understanding fundamental fitness terminology and concepts.

questions.question: What does 'aerobic exercise' primarily utilize?
questions.explanation: Aerobic exercise uses oxygen to produce energy and is sustained at a lower intensity.

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of anaerobic exercise?
questions.explanation: Sprinting is anaerobic as it requires quick bursts of energy without relying on oxygen.

questions.question: What is cardiovascular fitness?
options: The ability of your heart and lungs to supply oxygen during exercise
questions.explanation: Cardiovascular fitness is the ability of the heart and lungs to deliver oxygen efficiently.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of strength training?
questions.explanation: Strength training builds muscle mass and increases bone density.
